author: RavioliGalNotGuy
title: Sturdy and Playable, excellent job LEGO!!!
review:
Being a huge fan of the NINJAGO theme and series, I was excited when this set came out, as it is the only set with my favorite ninja and the only ninja I didn't have (can you guess which is which?). 

Minifigures

This set comes with Lloyd, Cole and a Vermillion, the new enemy. The ninja robes are better designed than ever, a recurring idea that works. The Vermillion has neat armor and an even cooler helmet.

Build and Design

The design for this set is stellar! The dragon prow, the tucked-away cockpit, everything!! The best part is definitely the canoes, the first in its color, I think. The front has a wide area for a minifig to stand for the cannons, effectively represented by two stud shooters. Did I mention the wings?

Summary

Being a fan of NINJAGO, most of the sets are good. This one, however, takes the cake! Every aspect of this set is playable, and the canoes are a nice touch. 5 stars for everything and

Great Job, LEGO!!!

(Side note: I have noticed that the ninja appear to be wearing... sandals? Fascinating!)
